entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 6:20 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
